name: Nilight TPE Floor Mats for Hyundai IONIQ 5 SE Standard Range SE SEL 2022 2023 2024 Movable Console,All Weather Custom Fit Heavy Duty Floor Liners
about_this_item: DIRECT FIT - These custom made floor mats are perfectly tailored to compatible with Hyundai IONIQ 5 SE Standard Range SE SEL 2022 2023.
DURABILITY - Nilight's heavy duty mats are constructed from high-quality TPE can stand up to years of wear and tear especially compared to less sturdy cloth mats.

SEAMLESS PROTECTION - Nilight's floor mats protect your upholstery from big spills as well as the smallest sand particles. No matter the damaging effects of water, mud, snow, ice, dirt, sand, pet fur, and debris.
FAST CLEANING - You can wash off messes that end up on your floor mats in seconds with soap and water. In some cases, a simple spray of the hose will do the trick.

LIFETIME SERVICE - Everything is made to order with our advanced CNC cutting machines and applications so you can make certain your floor mats are created just for you to your preferred specifications. Your order will also include all the required clips and fixings to fasten your mats to your existing car fixings.

title: Perfect Fit
content: These fit perfectly in my 2021 Santa Fe. I was going to get the weathertech mats but I thought I would give these a try first since they were less than half the price. They fit with no overlapping and are not oversized at all. I pull them out every week when I clean my car and wipe them down. Easy to put back in. They are not the cheap hard plastic that don't sit right. Soft plastic that is easy to clean. They haven't hardened in the cold either which is nice.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: Just perfect...fit, quality, ease of use. Nice looking!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2024

title: Perfect fit!
content: We had WeatherTech floor mats in our last car, but didn’t want to pay out that much money for our new car.  Read the reviews and went with these.  Some reported theirs arrived creased, our did not.  One lip was slightly out of whack, but once it sat in the car awhile, it fixed itself.  Fits perfectly in the car and seem very durable.  Time will tell, but I would recommend them.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Fits perfectly for my car and keeps out sand and mud that gets tracked inside the car especially if it’s raining

title: The combo of the quality and the price is fantastic!
content: These are awesome.  I just put them in last night and they fit like a glow.  The holes lined up perfect with the hooks so they will certainly stay in place.  The second row did not seem to fit at first, I had to stretch it to get the hooks to line up.  This is only because they were fresh out of the box and had not settled from the folds.  The quality is excellent , I am sure they will prove to be durable and easy to clean.  The color is deep black with a texture, so they look really nice.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: These mats fit perfectly in my 2023 Hyundai Palisade XRT!! I love them, definitely recommend!!

title: Fit but still a little lumpy
content: These are great floor mats for the Ioniq 5, very durable and they fit perfect but they come folded and bent in a box so I'm still waiting for them to flatten completely (but I think they will).  They're very durable and thick and well made.  No garish designs or big logos on them, nice and plain.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023

title: Ok fit with some wrinkles on the sides though
content: Installation was easy but the mats were jammed inside the packaging box, and was hard for them to return to original shape. Instead, I found wrinkles here and there, and after installation, wrinkles still present and made the mats not able to cover all sides. FIt was OK, and coverage is pretty good except for areas with wrinkles.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023

title: Floor Mats that Fit and Are Durable
content: Ill need to wait and see how long it will take the mats to become wrinkle free. I will follow up then.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023

title: What a robust and attractive floor mat!!
content: i just purchased a new Ioniq 5 and was looking for floor mats to protect the carpeting. These floor mats are perfect. They fit snugly in the front and back floorboards. The mats are made of heavy-duty rubber and are easy to remove for cleaning. The mats have an anti-slip quality to them to prevent your feet from slipping off the pedals while driving. These are quality floormats that are highly functional and look good in my car.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023

title: Mixed feelings!
content: I acquired this mat for my wife’s 2022 Hyundai Ioniq 5. The factory installed ones were permeable to liquids and were virtually impossible to clean. These are impervious to liquids, are easy to clean and the fit is perfect. My wife loves them and also highly recommend them. In addition, the cost benefit is very high. A must for anyone driving an ioniq 5.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023

title: Fits well on 2023 SEL trim
content: THE GOOD: 1st row mats, work great. They fit, they protect floor, they feel sturdy and I would recommend these mats for anyone looking for 1st row mats.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023

title: Perfect fit for 2023 Ioniq 5 (SE RWD)
content: THE BAD: The floor mats that were on the picture were not the same floor mats that we received. As you can see by the picture, the 2nd row mats do not fit the 2nd row on our IONIQ 5.
